sentences.sContent: We went to an apiary and got real sheets of used bees wax.
sentences.sContent_eng: We went to an apiary and got real sheets of used bees wax.
sentences.sCn: 我们去了一个养蜂场，得到真正的张用于蜜蜂蜡。

sentences.sContent: The removals of the supers and the honey extraction operations are recorded in the apiary register.
sentences.sContent_eng: The removals of the supers and the honey extraction operations are recorded in the apiary register.
sentences.sCn: 蜂蜜的收获等生产活动都记录在养蜂场登记簿中。

trans.tranOther: a place where bees are kept, usually in beehives
